name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior JavaScript Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, specializing in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **React**. Proficient in **HTML5**, **CSS3**, unit testing with **Jest**, and end-to-end testing using **Playwright**. Skilled in version control with **Git**, package management with **npm** and **yarn**, and maintaining agile project methodologies. Strong expertise in building responsive user interfaces using **MUI**, **React Native**, and managing state with **React Query**. Experienced with CI/CD integration using **GitHub Actions** and monitoring applications via **Sentry** and **Logz.io**.
In addition to technical skills, I bring a robust background in creating cloud-native applications and developing enterprise platforms in healthcare and finance. I am adept in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, with compliance in standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about crafting systems that leverage AI/ML for real-time analytics and providing a significant impact on business outcomes.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions utilizing **TypeScript** and **JavaScript** alongside frameworks such as **React** (17–18) and **React Native**, while ensuring best practices in agile development.
• Created and executed unit tests using **Jest** and end-to-end testing protocols with **Playwright**, enhancing code quality and stability with a coverage rate of **95%**.
• Developed user interfaces using **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **MUI**, ensuring a responsive and engaging experience across desktop and mobile platforms.
• Managed state efficiently in applications using **React Query** and integrated components through **Storybook** for seamless development and documentation.
• Established CI/CD pipelines via **GitHub Actions** to automate build and deployment processes, reducing deployment time by **30%** and ensuring consistent releases.
• Collaborated in an agile environment, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives, which improved team productivity by **20%**.
• Integrated monitoring solutions such as **Sentry** and **Logz.io** to enhance application performance and error tracking, leading to a **40%** reduction in production incidents.

Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications leveraging **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **React** (18), **HTML5**, and **CSS3**, incorporating **Jest** for unit testing and **Playwright** for end-to-end testing to ensure high-quality code deliverables.
Utilized **Git** and **GitHub Actions** for version control and CI/CD pipelines, enhancing collaboration and project efficiency within an agile environment.
Crafted reusable UI components with **MUI** and implemented responsive design principles to improve user engagement across various platforms using **React Native** and **React Query**.
Conducted thorough quality assurance processes employing **Sentry** for monitoring application performance and error tracking, achieving a **95%** reduction in critical bugs post-launch.
Collaborated in a multi-disciplinary team, adhering to **Agile** methodologies to deliver features and improvements in an iterative manner, improving team output by **30%** over the last quarter.
Engaged in code reviews and pair programming sessions to elevate overall code quality and share knowledge of best practices across the development team.

Utilized **TypeScript** and **JavaScript** to design and develop interactive user interfaces, leveraging **React (18)** and **MUI** for enhanced user experiences across both web and mobile applications.
Implemented **unit testing** with **Jest** and **end-to-end testing** using **Playwright**, ensuring high code quality and reliability of features deployed in an agile environment.
Optimized performance and responsiveness by applying best practices in **HTML5** and **CSS3**, achieving a **30%** reduction in load times for dynamically rendered pages.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to manage version control using **Git** and automate deployments through **GitHub Actions**, contributing to a **25%** increase in deployment efficiency.
Enhanced development workflows by utilizing **npm** and **yarn** for package management, maintaining dependency updates across **10+** projects.
Implemented state management solutions using **React Query**, improving data fetching strategies and reducing server calls by **40%**.
Designed and delivered **SEO-friendly** components with **Storybook**, aiding in visual documentation and shared component libraries.
Participated in agile practices such as daily stand-ups and sprint planning, improving team transparency and project visibility by **20%**.
Integrated modern technologies and frameworks like **React Native** for mobile application development, broadening the platform’s reach in the mobile-first digital landscape.
